text: The 1940 George Washington Colonials football team was an American football team that represented George Washington University as an independent during the 1940 college football season. In its third season under head coach William Reinhart, the team compiled a 5–3–1 record and was outscored by a total of 82 to 78. ==Schedule== ==References== George Washington Category:George Washington Colonials football seasons George Washington Colonials football
title: 1940 George Washington Colonials football team
